en.title: About Me
en.heading: Hello! üëã
paragraphs: I am Pablo, a computer engineer specialized in software design and architecture. My main focus is leading development projects as a Tech Lead.

I am passionate about project management and hold a master's degree in Project Management. Throughout my career I have led teams of between 5 and 10 people, ensuring effective collaboration and achieving goals.
I consider myself a curious and creative person, committed to continuous learning and always staying updated with the latest trends in software engineering.
As a Tech Lead, my priority is to build strong relationships with the team, foster a collaborative work environment, and guide the implementation of efficient technical solutions.
If you would like to get in touch, feel free to email me at pabloperdomofalcon@gmail.com or reach me on LinkedIn. Let's talk!
